Query.Title: Calculating Pension Plan Assets.
Query.Description: This query returns the components of Pension Plan Assets and the Total Plan Assets in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Calculating Berry Ratio In XF.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the Berry Ratio for companies on a specific datadate using the Compustat packages in Xpressfeed. Note: This query replicates the Berry Ratio (BERRY) concept in Research Insight.

Query.Title: Calculating Cstat Common Equity.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query approximates Common Equity - Tangible (CEQT) on a quarterly basis using a particular gvkey and date.

Query.Title: Calculating Daily TRFD
Query.Description: This query returns the most recent value for Total Return Factor - Daily (TRFD) using the Compustat database in Xpressfeed. Note:Uncomment the second query to return TRFD for a specific datadate.

Query.Title: Calculating Daily Total Return For an Index
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, MSCI Index Level Data(Legacy)
Query.Description: This query calculates the daily total return and daily price return for the SP 500 Index from the current date, as far back as data is available for Index Value - Total Return - Dividends (PRCCDDIV) and Index Value - Price (PRCCD):

Query.Title: Calculating Debt-To-Equity-Ratio Anuall and quarterly.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query calculates Debt-to-Equity (aka Risk, Gearing or Leverage) ratio Anually. Note:Uncomment the second query to return Debt-To-Equity Ratio for Quartely basis.

Query.Title: Calculating Dividend Yeild.
Query.Description: This query calculates dividend yield for IBM as of December 31, 2007 based on Indicated Annual Dividend Rate - Monthly (DVRATE) and Price-Close Monthly (PRCCM).

Query.Title: Calculating Gross margin(Anually and Quarterly)
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query calculates Gross Margin on an Annual basis in the Compustat database. Note: Uncomment the second query to get quarterly results.

Query.Title: Calculating Number Of Companies With A value Of Market Data Item On A Specific Date
Query.Description: This query returns the number of companies on the NYSE that have a value for Trading Volume - Monthly (CSHTRM) value on January 31, 2011

Query.Title: Calculating Number Of Companies with Final Annual Updates.
Query.Description: This query counts the number of final updates for Y07 fiscal-year domestic industrial companies as of 52108:

Query.Title: Calculating Price-to-book-ratio for ADRs
Query.Description: This formula calculate the price-to-book ratio, also called market-to-book, for American Depositary Receipts (ADRs) (PRCCMCSHOCADRRC)CEQQ Note:This query returns the price-to-book ratio for LOreal - ADR in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Calculating Quarterly Enterprise Value for a company.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This calculates Enterprise Value on a quarterly basis\xc2\xa0for\xc2\xa0IBM\xc2\xa0in\xc2\xa0Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Calculating ROIC.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query calculates Return on Invested Capital (ROIC) for a company using the Compustat packages in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Calculating Semi-Annual Cash Flow.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query calculates semi-annual cash flow from operating activities (OANCFY) for international companies.

Query.Title: Calculating Daily Total Return For Multiple Periods.
Query.Description: This calculates the Daily Total Returns for IBMs primary issue (GVKEY = 006066, IID = 01) for three time periods:Note: The 1-year return (TRT1Y) is calculated over the period from March 6, 2012 thru March 6, 2013. The 3-year return (TRT3Y) is calculated over the period from March 4, 2010 thru March 6, 2013. The 5-year return (TRT5Y) is calculated over the period from March 4, 2008 thru March 6, 2013.

Query.Title: Calculating Differences In CSHOC.
Query.Description: This query determines when Common Shares Outstanding - Current (CSHOC) values change from one day to the next for a company and calculates the difference in those values.

Query.Title: Calculating Market Value for Global Companies with multiple issues
Query.Description: This query calculates market capitalization for a Global company with multiple issues with fundamental data available.

Query.Title: Non-Interest Bearing Current Liabilities.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query calculates total non-interest bearing current liabilities.

Query.Title: Calculating Total Borrowing Rate.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the Borrowing Rate by dividing Interest Expense by Total Debt multiplied by 100 to return a percentage for IBM for the fiscal-year ending 12312008.

Query.Title: Counting CSTAT Market Data
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query subtracts the number of companies with market data that also have an annual descriptor record indicating the availability of fundamental data, and returns the number of companies with market data ONLY.

Query.Title: Counting Number of Observations For A Data Item
Query.Description: This query returns the number of companies that have a value for SALE in the co_afnd2 table in Xpressfeed Note: Uncomment the second query to get the number of securities per DATADATE in the sec_dprc table in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Determining Primary Issues
Query.Description: This query returns the primary issue when more than one issue is listed as primary in the Compustat Company table in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Operating Segments For a Company.
Query.Description: This query returns all operating segments for ALLIS-CHALMERS ENERGY INC as of 12312007 _

Query.Title: Finding Active Companies that have filed Bankruptcy.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query finds companies that have pricing in the last year and have a filed bankruptcy flagged with a TLGL footnote on Total Assets using the Compustat financials in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Active/Inactive Companies.
Query.Description: This query returns all active companies in Xpressfeed. Note: Uncomment the second query to get all inactive companies.

Query.Title: Finding Adjusted CSHOQ for a company over a Spefic Time period.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This querypulls the quarterly common shares outstanding (CSHOQ) on an unadjusted and adjusted basis.

Query.Title: Finding Adjusted Dividends and iid for specific datadates.
Query.Description: This query provides the daily dividends on an adjusted and unadjusted basis.

Query.Title: Finding All Changes To An Item Over Time In Compustat Point-In-Time
Query.Description: This query uses tables in the Compustat\xc2\xae Point-in-Time Backtest Package to show original values and any subsequent changes to a data item over time and is valid for users of MS SQL. It returns the datadate, pointdate, value and data code for the original and revised instances. The query represents an abbreviated time series in that it does not return all datadates and pointdates f or the item: It only returns datadates and pointdates for when there is an original value or a change. Note:This query specifically identifies original values and changes to quarterly sales for GVKEY 001487. The mnemonic and GVKEY can be changed to run for other items and companies.

Query.Title: Finding all of the I/B/E/S EPS estimates for a Company.
Query.Description: This query returns all of the IBES EPS estimates for IBM.

Query.Title: Finding Annual Transperancy Notes For A Company.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Transparency, Transparency History, Vendor Xpressfeed Dictionary, Xpressfeed Dictionary
Query.Description: This query returns all annual item notes and note subtypes for Starbucks Corp later than September 30, 2007 in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding CSTAT Banks.
Query.Description: This query returns a list of the banks included in the Xpressfeed\xe2\x84\xa2 database population and removes duplicate names.

Query.Title: Finding Business segments for a company.
Query.Description: This query returns the Company Name, GVKEY, Data Date, Segment Name, and Segment Sales for business segments for the entire history of a company in Xpressfeed. Note: Uncomment the second query to get the number of all active segments specified per segment for a company on each available data date using Compustat packages in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding FIC Changes Using North America Snapshot
Query.Description: This query finds changes to the ISO Country Code - Incorporation (FIC) in the last 20 years using the cscompany table in North America Snapshot.

Query.Title: Finding Canadian Companies.
Query.Description: This query returns Canadian companies by annual datadate.

Query.Title: Finding Companies In A Located State.
Query.Description: This query finds companies in Colorado and displays their City, ZIPPostal Code, and GICS Sub-Industry Code and description.

Query.Title: Finding Companies TSX Venture Exchange.
Query.Description: This query returns companies on the TSX Venture Exchange OR the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX).

Query.Title: Finding Companies Trading Pink Sheets or OTC
Query.Description: This query returns all of the companies trading pink sheets or OTC.

Query.Title: Finding Companies Where CURCD Differs From CURCDQ.
Query.Description: This query returns companies where the ISO Currency Code - Annual is different from the ISO Currency Code - Quarterly for the same year

Query.Title: Finding Companies Who Report Cash Flows Using Direct Method Statement.
Query.Description: This query returns a line for each company and time period when the company reports a Cash Flow Statement using the Direct Method.

Query.Title: Finding Companies With Amended Financial Statements.
Query.Description: This query returns all companies that filed an amended 10-K for the fiscal year ending 12312009.

Query.Title: Finding Number of Companies With Fundamental Data Available.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized, Xpressfeed Reference
Query.Description: This query returns the GVKEYs and the Company Names for U.S. and Canadian companies with fundamental data. Note:To get fundamental data for active companies use: WHERE ( A.costat = A ), To get fundamental data for inactive companies use: WHERE ( A.costat = I ). To get the number of active and inactive Canadian companies with fundamental data available for the 2012 fiscal year use: AND ( b.datadate = 6302012 AND b.datadate = 5312013 )

Query.Title: Finding Companies With Multiple Issues.
Query.Description: This query returns all companies with multiple issues of stock.

Query.Title: Finding Companies With Ommitted Or Suspended Dividends
Query.Description: This query identifies a large group of companies that have omitted or suspended dividends in September 2008, including Lehman, AIG, Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.

Query.Title: Finding Companies With Preferred Stock And Without Common.
Query.Description: This query returns companies without common or ordianry stock, but with preferred shares in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Daily Market Data For A security.
Query.Description: This query provides the daily close price (PRCCD), adjustment factor (AJEXDI), and common shares outstanding (CSHOC) for a security over a specified date range.

Query.Title: Finding Daily Total Return for A Time Period.
Query.Description: This query returns the Daily Total Return of one issue for a one-year time period using the 1-year return for SP Global, Inc. from November 1, 2017 to November 1, 2018 in this example.

Query.Title: Finding Data Availibilty For A Particular Index.
Query.Description: This query the data available the REIT Index in Xpresfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Data Item That Have Never Been Restated In Snapshot.
Query.Description: This query returns a true or false based on how many records exist in the Snapshot North America database for COGSQ for IBM:

Query.Title: Finding Data Item Translated To USD for Non-US Companies.
Query.Description: This query returns the Global Industry Classification Standard (GICS) Sector, GICS Description (GICDESC), International Organization for Standardization (ISO) Currency Code (CURCD), Revenue -Total (REVT) displayed in U.S. Dollars (USD), USD Translation Rate, and the 12-month moving Average Exchange Rate (EXRAT12M) for all European companies in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Dates in XF
Query.Description: This query used to return a date for a specified period of time back from today. Note: Uncomment the second query to return ate one year earlier than another date, where a.datadate is the specified date and -1 is the relative reference.

Query.Title: Finding Dual Listed Companies with Both US and Non-US Security Listings.
Query.Description: This query returns all companies that have both an a U.S. security listing (IID of 01) and a non-U.S. security listing (IID of 01C), meaning they are double-followed Canadian companies.

Query.Title: Finding Duplicate Company Names.
Query.Description: This query finds multiple company names that exist for more than one distinct GVKEY in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding ETFs And SPDRs
Query.Description: This query search to return ONLY SPDRs in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Economic Country ISO Description Codes.
Query.Description: The economic indicator data does not have its own reference table. In order to access the country names for the ISO codes, link to the r_country table. This query returns a list of country codes.

Query.Title: Finding FASB 158 Pro Forma Impact On StockHolders Equity.
Query.Description: This query calculates the impact of SFAS 158 on Shareholders Equity for years prior to adoption (assuming a statutory tax rate of 35%).

Query.Title: Finding First Occurance For Pricing For A Security.
Query.Description: This query returns the date of the first occurrence of pricing in the database for a security.

Query.Title: Finding Foreign Goverment Sales.
Query.Description: This query returns GVKEYs where the Customer Name contains foreign g.

Query.Title: Finding GDRs In XF.
Query.Description: This query finds Global Depositary Receipts (GDS) by searching the Issue Description item (DSCI) for GDR and returns all items in the the security data table.

Query.Title: Finding Details with Par Value and Exchange Country.
Query.Description: This query returns GVKEYs and IID with a Par Value and the associated Exchange Country.

Query.Title: Finding CSTAT Holidays By Country
Query.Description: This query returns U.S. holidays in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding IBES Broker Recommendation for A stock.
Query.Description: Query the Xpressfeed database on the data item IBES Recommendations Consensus (IBRECON). This item is located in the ibwrecom data group. This item is the mean recommendation consensus. It is also helpful to pull in IBES Number of Recommendations (IBNOREC) from the same table because it gives more meaning to the mean recommendation. The possible recommendations are:1- Strong Buy2- Buy3- Hold4- Underperform5- Sell SQL Query:

Query.Title: Finding Index Membership for A country.
Query.Description: This query returns the dates that a company was a constituent of an index along with the name of the index it was a member of.

Query.Title: Finding CSTAT Issues Classified As A Special Stock.
Query.Description: This query returns all of the data items from the security table for issues of stock classified as Special Stock (TPCI = Q) in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Limited Partnerships.
Query.Description: This query searches for LP as the last 2 letters in the CONM (Company Name) data item from the company data group. Note: Uncomment the second query to find Limited Partnerships by searching for LP in the DSCI (Security Description) data item from the security data group.

Query.Title: Finding Master Limited Partnership In XF.
Query.Description: This query finds Master Limited Partnerships (MLP) using Compustat data in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Mutual Funds.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Xpressfeed Reference
Query.Description: This query is used to screen Xpressfeed for closed-end funds only, search for SIC code of 6726, Issue Type (TPCI) of 7 (Mutual or investment trust fund), and Net Asset Value (NAVM) is a value.

Query.Title: Finding NAICS And SIC Codes For A company Segments.
Query.Description: This query returns the Standard Industrial Classification Code - Segment (SICS) and North American Industry Classification Code - Segment (NAICSS) for a companys segments.

Query.Title: Finding non MSCI indices.
Query.Description: This query returns non MSCI indices with constituents available in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding nonTrading Active Companies.
Query.Description: This query returns all companies that are not actively trading on any exchange, but are still active.

Query.Title: Finding Number Of Companies That went Inactive During A Year
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query counts the number of companies from Popsrc D that went inactive in 2007. Note: Remove co_adesind.popsrc = 'D' to count he number of companies from the entire global ", database that went inactive in 2007.

Query.Title: Finding Number of Companies with Finalized Data By Month.
Query.Description: This query returns the number of companies that have finalized data by month.

Query.Title: Finding Number of Constituents For MSCI indices.
Query.Description: This query he number of constituents in an MSCI index - Daily Package for a specified gvkeyx as of a specified datadate

Query.Title: Finding Number of Securities Issued per Company.
Query.Description: This query returns the number of securities issued per company.

Query.Title: Finding Prelimanary And Final Updates Over The Last Two Days
Query.Description: This query returns company that have had a final quarterly update over the last two days.

Query.Title: Finding Price Close Daily.
Query.Description: This query returns Price-Close Daily (PRCCD) on the day of a companys Initial Public Offering (IPO) in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Pro Forma Records In XF.
Query.Description: This query finds pro-forma companies using the Compustat database in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding CSTAT Product Lines For A company.
Query.Description: This query returns all reported product lines for Georgia Pacific as of December 31, 2002.

Query.Title: Finding Pure Canadian Companies
Query.Description: This query returns pure Canadian companies by searching for companies with IID ending with C and Stock Exchange Code (EXCHG) = 7-10 to represent the Canadian exchanges, which are both from the Security table, and Country of Incorporation (FIC) = CAN (Canada) from the Company table.

Query.Title: Finding Quarterly Transperancy Data for An Item.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized, Transparency, Transparency History, Vendor Xpressfeed Dictionary, Xpressfeed Dictionary
Query.Description: This query returns the transparency calculations of Cost of Goods Sold - Quarterly (COGSQ) on one datadate using the Compustat Transparency data in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding REITs In Xf.
Query.Description: This query return Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) companies by searching for companies with a Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code of 6798 or a Global Industry Classification Standard (GICS) Industry code of 404020 in the company table in Xpressfeed.(Uncomment the second query to get GICS).

Query.Title: Finding Security Identifiers for all issues and all dates in Snapshot
Query.Description: This query returns the identifiers and the exchanges that were active for each issue during specified times.

Query.Title: Finding Segment Items.
Query.Description: This query returns a list of all segment items and their descriptions.

Query.Title: Finding Date Of Adoption.
Query.Description: This query identifies companies who have adopted FASB 132 and returns the date of adoption.

Query.Title: Finding Monthly Return For A Time Period Uisng Monthly Pricing.
Query.Description: This query returns the 3-Month Total Return for McGraw-Hill Financial (GVKEY: 007163) using monthly pricing from December 13, 2006 to March 31, 2007.

Query.Title: Finding Multiple Auditors For Companies.
Query.Description: This query returns all international companies and their auditors on a specific datadate.

Query.Title: Finding Pre-FASB Companies.
Query.Description: This query returns the Company Name (CONM), Global Company Key (GVKEY), and Security Description (DSCI) for pre-FASB companies in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Primary Issue Of Stock.
Query.Description: This query returns the Primary Issue for a company in the Global database for a specific from and thru date.

Query.Title: Finding Number Of Companies In Annual Or Monthly Files In XF.
Query.Description: This query returns the number of companies in the co_adesind data group.

Query.Title: Finding Number Of Companies reporting Annual, Semi-Annual, Or Quarterly Data By Country In XF.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the number of companies in Great Britain that report semi-annual data for the period ending June 30, 2006. Note: For Annual Data there is no need for any 'AND co_idesind.rp = ' condition."]

Query.Title: Finding Companies that emerged from Bankruptcy.
Query.Description: This query identifies quarterly periods that have an AG footnote on Assets-Total - Quarterly (ATQ) in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Ideentifying The Most Current Datadate With Quarterly financials.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query identifies the most current datadate for multiple companies where quarterly financial data is available in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Joining Semi Annual Income Statement Items with Quarterly Balance Sheet Items for International Companies.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query joins Semi-Annual Sales from the Income Statement items with Quarterly Total Assets from the Balance Sheet items for International companies.

Query.Title: Linking MIC TO Stock Exchange.
Query.Description: This This query maps Market Identifier Codes (MIC) to Stock Exchange Codes (EXCHG) in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Customer Names And Sales For A Company.
Query.Description: This query returns all customer names and customer sales for Apple as of September 30, 2017 using Compustat Segment data in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Finding Geographic Segements For A company.
Query.Description: This query returns all geographic segments and sales for each segment for IBM as of December 31, 2016 using Compustat Segment packages in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Pulling All Change To A Cstat Item Over Time In Canadian Point In Time In XF.
Query.Description: This query query specifically identifies original values and the corresponding changes from the original to restated values for Quarterly Selling, General Administrative expenses for GVKEY 149049:

Query.Title: Finding AJEXQ For Currrent Month.
Query.Description: This query In Compustat Xpressfeed, AJEXQ is tied to quarterly fundamental data availability so AJEXQ is not available until the fundamental data for that period is available. You can find more current information in Compustat Xpressfeed utilizing the co_adjfact data group. Co_adjfact is organized with effective from and thru dates rather than specific data periods. Note: Uncomment the second query to return the adjustment factor as of a specific date returning only one row of data.

Query.Title: Finding Annual Fair Value Asst Items.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns annual Fair Value Asset Items related to SFAS 157 and Fair Value Changes in Earnings related to SFAS 159.

Query.Title: Finding Annual Fair Value Liabilty Items In XF.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns annual Fair Value Liability Items related to SFAS 157 and Fair Value Changes in Earnings related to SFAS 159.

Query.Title: Finding Annual Fundamental Data At The Issue Level.
Query.Description: This query returns annual fundamental data for Shanghai Electric Group Co Ltd. in Xpressfeed. ---Pulls Annual Issue Data , Footnotes, and Data Codes.

Query.Title: Finding annual fundamental financial data items.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns all of the annual fundamental financial data items for all annual periods for a company in XF. Note: Uncomment the second query to return ll data in the Company table for all companies that contain Enron anywhere in the company name (CONM)

Query.Title: Pulling Annual Transparency Notes For Multiple Items Companies Years.
Query.Description: This query returns the Compustat\xc2\xae annual transparency notes for Net Sales (SALE), Cost of Goods Sold (COGS), Selling, General and Administrative Expenses (XSGA), Depreciation and Amortization (DP), and Special Items (SPI) for IBM (GVKEY 006066), McCormick Co Inc (GVKEY 007146), and SP Global, Inc.(GVKEY 007163) for any time periods after November 30, 2016 in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Calculating BerryQ Ratio In XF.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the quarterly Berry Ratio for a company using the Compustat packages in Xpressfeed. Note: This query replicates the quarterly Berry Ratio (BERRYQ) concept in Research Insight.

Query.Title: Pulling CFLPS In XF.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns Cash Flow per Share for companies using the Compustat packages in Xpressfeed. Note: This query replicates the Cash Flow per Share (CFLPS) concept in Research Insight.

Query.Title: Pulling CFL In XFF.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the Cash Flow for companies using the Compustat packages in Xpressfeed\xe2\x84\xa2: Note: This query replicates the Cash Flow (CFL) concept in Research Insight.

Query.Title: Calculating Cash Flow Statement For Korean Companies.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized, Xpressfeed Reference
Query.Description: This query returns a Cash Flow Statement for companies from Korea.

Query.Title: Pulling Changes To Cash Flow Working Capital Changes For FASB 95.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the components of the Working Capital changes on the Cash Flow Statement for a company using the Compustat\xc2\xae data in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Pulling Companies That Adopted FASB 158.
Query.Description: This query returns companies who adopted SFAS 158 by looking for an AC footnote on Pension - Funded Status (PCPPAO_FN) from the aco_pnfnta datagroup.

Query.Title: Pulling Companies With Highest Market Cap That Had FY Change.
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the companies with the highest market cap that also had a fiscal-year change using the Compustat packages in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Pulling Companies With More Than Specified Number Of Securities.
Query.Description: This query returns all companies that have issued more than 10 securities.

Query.Title: Pulling Company Level Notes.
Query.Description: This query returns the company-level notes for a company after a specific data date.

Query.Title: Pulling Comparable Sales.
Query.Description: This query returns the details of the Comparable Sales (%) - Quarterly for a company in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Pulling Companies That Adopted IFRS In XF
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: Companies that have adopted International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) can be identified by an AN or AN-combination footnote on the Comparability Status item (COMPTS). This query returns companies that adopted IFRS indicated by an AN or AN-combination footnote in COMPST preceded by a DS footnote.

Query.Title: Pulling Current Ratio In XF
Query.ReqPackage: Core, Core 2, Core History, Core Prelim Standardized
Query.Description: This query returns the current ratio quarterly for IBM for the quarter ended March 31, 2008.

Query.Title: Finding Daily Translation Rates.
Query.Description: This query returns the daily exchange rate to translate Hong Kong Dollars (HKD) to U.S. Dollars (USD) since inception.

Query.Title: Pulling EXCHANGETIER In XF
Query.Description: This query pulls a list of all of the EXCHGTIER codes and descriptions for each Stock Exchange (EXCHGCD). Note: Uncomment the second query to return all of the companies in the sec_history table that have Stock Exchange Tier (EXCHGTIER) data available.

Query.Title: The following sample query below retrieves Total return calculation for company INTL BUSINESS
Query.Description: The following sample query below retrieves Total return calculation for company INTL BUSINESS MACHINES CORP (006066).
